flawed_nl_solution:
After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has $400 - $100 = $<<400-100=320>>320
Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives $320 / 2 = $<<320/2=160>>160
After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates $160 + $10 = $<<160+10=170>>170 to the shelter.
#### 170

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 320. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
